Background: Acrobat Alignment: Chaotic Evil Deity: Gorum (CN)
Experience: 11471/12000 Level: 12 Speed: 25 Size: Medium Encumbered/Maximum Bulk: 8/13
Ability Notes:
Ability Boosts: Ability Boost (Choose 12 from any)

Experienced Professional: Critical failures when using Lore to Earn Income are normal failures, and normal failures give twice the income
Steady Balance: Balance successes are critical successes/Never flat-footed during Balance/Can use Acrobatics to Grab an Edge
Unmistakable Lore: Critical failures on any trained Lore are normal failures and critical successes on a Lore with master rank provide additional information
Combat
Hit Points: 128 Armor Class: 26 (dexterity; trained)
Armor: None Shield: Wooden (+2 AC when raised; hardness 3; HP 12) Weapons: Club (+19 1d6+3 B R10'; strength; expert); Crossbow (+18 1d8 P R120'; dexterity; expert); Dagger (+19 1d4+3 P/S R10'; strength; expert)

Magic
Spell Slots: A1: 4; A2: 4; A3: 4; A4: 4; A5: 4; A6: 4; AC1: 5 Focus Points: 2 Attack: Arcane Innate: +19 (charisma; expert); Arcane: +19 (intelligence; expert) Spell DC: Arcane Innate: 29 (charisma; expert); Arcane: 29 (intelligence; expert)
Spells:
Acid Arrow (A2 Evo): (2) R120' Spell attack inflicts 3d8 HP acid, or double HP on a critical success, plus 1d6 HP persistent acid (heightened +2 inflicts +2d8 HP initial and +1d6 HP persistent)
Acid Splash (AC1 Evo): (2) R30' Spell attack inflicts 1d6 HP acid, plus 1 HP persistent acid on a critical success, and 1 HP acid splash (heightened 3rd inflicts 1d6+3 HP initial and 2 HP persistent; 5th inflicts 2d6+3 HP initial, 3 HP persistent, and 2 HP splash; 7th inflicts 3d6+3 HP initial, 4 HP persistent, and 3 HP splash; 9th inflicts 4d6+3 HP initial, 5 HP persistent, and 4 HP splash)
Aerial Form (A4 Tra): (2) Self becomes a Medium bat, bird, pterosaur, or wasp with 5 temporary HP, Armor Class 30, +16 attack, +5 damage, low-light vision, flight, +16 Acrobatics modifier, and creature-specific features for 1 min (heightened 5th becomes a Large creature with +10' Speed, 10 temporary HP, +18 attack, +8 damage, +20 Acrobatics; 6th becomes a Huge creature with +15' Speed, 10' reach, 15 temporary HP, Armor Class 33, +21 attack, +4 damage with double damage dice, +23 Acrobatics)
Air Bubble (A1 Con): (R) R60' Allows target to breathe normally in any environment for 1 min
Alarm (A1 Abj): (10 min) 20' burst triggers a mental or audible alarm when a Small or larger corporeal creature enters without saying a specified password for 8 hr (heightened 3rd allows specifying characteristics of triggering creatures)
Ant Haul (A1 Tra): (2) Touched can carry +3 Bulk without encumbrance and +6 Bulk maximum for 8 hr
Antimagic Field (A8 Abj): (3) 10' emanation disables spells and magic items while sustained for up to 1 min
Augment Summoning (A1 Foc Con): (1) R30' Summoned target gains +1 on all checks for 1 min
Baleful Polymorph (A6 Tra): (2) R30' Transforms the target's form into a harmless animal for 1 min, allowing a new save to revert each rd (save Will inflicts minor physical changes and sickened 1; critical success negates; critical failure transforms permanently and also affects the target's mind)
Banishment (A5 Abj): (2) R30' Returns the target to its home plane (save Will (-2 if cast using an additional action and a target anathema) negates; critical success inflicts stunned 1 on self; critical failure prevents the target's return for 1 week) (heightened 9th affects 10 targets)
Bind Undead (A3 Nec): (2) R30' Controls the actions of a mindless undead of level less than or equal to the spell level for 1 day
Black Tentacles (A5 Con): (3) R120' Successful spell attacks vs. Fortitude DC in a 20' burst inflict 3d6 HP bludgeoning and grabbed for 1 min, plus 1d6 HP bludgeoning each rd on grabbed creatures; escaping requires success vs. a DC 29 on an unarmed attack or inflicting 12 HP vs. Armor Class 29
Blindness (A3 Nec): (2) R30' Blinds the target for 1 min (save Fortitude effects last until next turn; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts permanent blindness)
Blink (A4 Con): (2) Self gains resistance 5 to non-force damage and can use Sustain to randomly teleport 10' for 1 min (heightened +2 gives +3 resistance)
Blur (A2 Ill): (2) Touched becomes concealed for 1 min
Burning Hands (A1 Evo): (2) 15' cone inflicts 2d6 HP fire (save basic Reflex) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP)
Call Of The Grave (A1 Foc Nec): (2) R30' Spell attack inflicts sickened 1, or sickened 2 and slowed 1 until no longer sickened on a critical success
Cataclysm (A10 Evo): (2) R1000' 60' burst inflicts 3d10 HP each acid, bludgeoning three times, cold, electricity, and fire, ignoring resistance 10 (save basic Reflex)
Chain Lightning (A6 Evo): (2) R500' Inflicts 8d12 HP electricity on a chain of targets, jumping up to 30' between each (save basic Reflex; critical success ends the chain) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d12 HP)
Charm (A1 Enc): (2) R30' Target becomes friendly, or helpful if already friendly, and cannot use hostile actions against self for 1 hr (save Will negates; critical success allows the target to notice the attempt; critical failure makes the target helpful) (heightened 4th effects last until next daily prep; heightened 8th effects last until next daily prep and affect 10 targets)
Charming Words (A1 Foc Enc): (1) R30' Prevents the target from taking hostile actions against self for 1 rd (save Will target suffers -1 attack and damage vs. self; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts stunned 1)
Chill Touch (AC1 Nec): (2) Touch inflicts 1d4+3 HP negative on a living creature (save basic Fortitude; critical failure also inflicts enfeebled 1 for 1 rd) or flat-footed on an undead for 1 rd (save Fortitude negates; critical failure also inflicts fleeing for 1 rd) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d4 HP on living)
Chromatic Wall (A5 Abj): (3) R120' 60'x30' wall shines 20' light and inflicts randomly-chosen effects on passing objects and creatures for 10 min: (1) destroys ammunition and inflicts 20 HP fire on creatures (save basic Reflex; Cone Of Cold counteracts); (2) destroys thrown weapons and inflicts 25 HP acid on creatures (save basic Reflex; Gust Of Wind counteracts); (3) negates energy effects and inflicts 30 HP electricity on creatures (save basic Reflex; Disintegrate counteracts); (4) blocks gasses and inflicts 10 HP poison and enfeebled 1 for 1 min on creatures (save basic Fortitude also negates enfeebled; Passwall counteracts) (heightened 7th effects last for 1 hr, inflicts +10 HP, and adds more effects possibilities: (5) negates petrification, sonic, and visual effects and inflicts Flesh To Stone on creatures (Magic Missile counteracts); (6) negates divination and mental effects and inflicts Warp Mind on creatures (Searing Light counteracts); (7) negates targeted spells and inflicts slowed 1 for 1 min on creatures (save Will negates; critical failure teleports to another plane; Dispel Magic counteracts); (8) effects as another option, but with -2 saves)
Clairaudience (A3 Div): (1 min) R500' Creates an invisible sensor that allows self to listen from the target location for 10 min
Clairvoyance (A4 Div): (1 min) R500' Creates an invisible sensor that allows self to see from the target location for 10 min
Cloak Of Colors (A5 Ill): (2) R30' Creatures adjacent to the target suffer dazzled, and successful attackers suffer blinded for 1 rd, for 1 min (save Will negates; critical failure inflicts stunned for 1 rd)
Cloudkill (A5 Nec): (3) R120' Creates a cloud in a 20' burst that inflicts 6d8 HP poison and moves away 10' each rd for 1 min (save basic Fortitude) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d8 HP)
Collective Transposition (A6 Con): (2) Teleports 2 targets within a 30' radius (save Will negates; critical success allows the target to control the teleport) (heightened +1 affects +1 target)
Color Spray (A1 Ill): (2) 15' cone inflicts stunned 1, blinded for 1 rd, and dazzled for 1 min (save Will inflicts dazzled for 1 rd only; critical success negates; critical failure extends blindness to 1 min)
Command (A1 Enc): (2) R30' Target obeys a command to approach, run away, drop a held object, drop prone, or stand in place for 1 action (save Will negates; critical failure causes the target to use all actions on its next turn to obey) (heightened 5th affects 10 targets)
Comprehend Language (A2 Div): (2) R30' Target understands a chosen heard language for 1 hr (heightened 3rd the target can also speak the language; 4th affects 10 targets)
Cone Of Cold (A5 Evo): (2) 60' cone inflicts 12d6 HP cold (save basic Reflex) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP)
Confusion (A4 Enc): (2) R30' Inflicts confused for 1 min or until a successful save (save Will inflicts stunned 1; critical success negates; critical failure allows no further save attempts) (heightened 8th affects 10 targets)
Contingency (A7 Abj): (10 min) Prepares a spell of up to 3 actions and 4th level to activate as a Reaction to a specified trigger (heightened 8th allows a 5th level spell; 9th allows a 6th level spell; 10th allows a 7th level spell)
Continual Flame (A2 Evo): (3) Touched object emits a heatless flame until dismissed
Control Water (A5 Evo): (2) R500' Raises or lowers water by 10' and slows water creatures in a 50'x50' area
Create Food (A2 Con): (1 hr) R30' Creates food for 6 Medium creatures that lasts for 1 day (heightened 4th creates food for 12; 6th creates food for 50; 8th creates food for 200)
Create Water (A1 Con): (2) Creates 2 gallons of water that last for 1 day
Creation (A4 Con): (1 min) R0' Creates an object of up to 5 cubic feet made of vegetable matter that lasts for 1 hr (heightened 5th object can include metal and common minerals)
Crushing Despair (A5 Enc): (2) 30' cone prevents Reactions, and failure on a second save inflicts slowed 1, for 1 min (save Will effects last for 1 turn; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts slowed 1 for 1 min with no second save) (heightened 7th affects a 60' cone)
Dancing Lights (AC1 Evo): (2) R120' Creates 4 floating torch lights in a 10' radius that can be moved 60' each rd while sustained
Darkness (A2 Evo): (3) R120' 20' burst suppresses natural light and magical light of equal or lesser level for 1 min (heightened 4th conceals targets within the darkness from creatures with darkvision)
Darkvision (A2 Div): (2) Allows self to see in darkness for 1 hr (heightened 3rd affects a touched target; 5th effects last until next daily prep)
Daze (AC1 Enc): (2) R60' Inflicts 3 HP mental (save basic Will; critical failure also inflicts stunned 1) (heightened +2 inflicts +1d6 HP)
Deafness (A2 Nec): (2) R30' Inflicts deafness for 10 min (save Fortitude effects last for 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts permanent deafness)
Detect Magic (AC1 Div): (2) 30' emanation reveals the presence of magic and lower-level illusions (heightened 3rd reveals the school of the highest-level effect; 4th reveals the approximate location of the highest-level effect)
Detect Scrying (A4 Div): (2) 30' emanation reveals scrying effects, along with the scrying creature for lower-level effects, for 1 hr (heightened 6th effects last until next daily prep)
Dimension Door (A4 Con): (2) Teleports self to a visible location within 120' (heightened 5th allows teleporting to a familiar location within 1 mile)
Dimensional Anchor (A4 Abj): (2) R30' Attempts to counteract any effect that would move the target to a different plane for 10 min (save Will effects last for 1 min; critical success negates; critical failure effects last for 1 hr)
Dimensional Lock (A7 Abj): (2) R120' 60' burst attempts to counteract any teleportation or planar travel until next daily prep
Dimensional Steps (A4 Foc Con): (1) Teleports self to a visible location within 20' (heightened +1 gives +5' teleport distance)
Disappearance (A8 Ill): (2) Touched becomes undetectable by any sense for 10 min
Discern Lies (A4 Div): (2) Self gains +4 Perception vs. lies for 10 min
Discern Location (A8 Div): (10 min) Reveals the exact location of a specified familiar creature or object for 10 min
Disintegrate (A6 Evo): (2) R120' Spell attack inflicts 12d10 HP, reducing the target to dust at 0 HP, or destroys a non-artifact 10' cube object (save basic Fortitude; critical hit worsens save by 1 degree) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d10 HP)
Disjunction (A9 Abj): (2) R120' Makes a counteract check to deactivate a non-artifact magic item; critical success destroys it
Dispel Magic (A2 Abj): (2) R120' Makes a counteract check to remove 1 spell effect from the target or to make a magic item inert for 10 min
Diviner's Sight (A1 Foc Div): (1) R30' Target may substitute self's d20 roll for a saving throw or skill check within 1 rd
Dominate (A6 Enc): (2) R30' Self controls the actions of the target until next daily prep; a successful save at end of each turn ends the spell (save Will inflicts stunned 1; critical success negates; critical failure allows further saves only upon repugnant orders) (heightened 10th effects are permanent)
Dragon Form (A6 Tra): (2) Self becomes a Large dragon with 40' Speed, 100' fly Speed, 10 temporary HP, Armor Class 30, +22 attack, +6 damage, a breath weapon, resistance 10 to the breath weapon damage type, darkvision, 60' imprecise scent, +23 Athletics modifier, and creature-specific features for 1 min (heightened 8th becomes a Huge creature with 120' fly speed, +5' reach, 15 temporary HP, Armor Class 33, +28 attack, +12 damage (breath weapon +14), +28 Athletics)
Dread Aura (A4 Foc Enc): (2) 30' emanation inflicts frightened 1 on foes while sustained for up to 1 min
Dream Council (A8 Ill): (10 min) Allows 12 known targets to communicate through a shared dream for 1 hr
Dream Message (A3 Enc): (10 min) Self sends 1 min of speech to a familiar creature, received the next time they sleep (heightened 4th sends speech to 10 familiar creatures)
Drop Dead (A5 Ill): (R) R120' Upon receiving the triggering wound, the target becomes invisible and is replaced by an illusionary corpse while sustained for up to 1 min; a hostile act by the target ends the spell (heightened 7th a hostile act does not end the spell)
Duplicate Foe (A7 Con): (3) R30' Creates a minion copy of a target up to level 15 with 70 HP and no special abilities while sustained for up to 1 min or until reduced to 0 HP; the copy loses 4d6 HP after each turn (save Fortitude the copy inflicts half HP and lasts 2 rd; critical success negates) (heightened +1 increases the target level that can be copied by 2 and the copy HP by 10)
Earthbind (A3 Tra): (2) R120' Brings a flying target to the ground and prevents flight and levitation for 1 rd (save Fortitude grounds target but does not prevent flight; critical success negates; critical failure effects last for 1 min)
Earthquake (A8 Evo): (2) R500' 60' burst inflicts difficult terrain, -2 attacks, Armor Class, and skill checks, a 40' fall (save Reflex negates), and structure collapse that inflicts 11d6 HP bludgeoning and knocked prone (save Reflex inflicts half HP and knocked prone; critical success inflicts half HP only; critical failure causes the fall save to fail) (heightened 10th increases range to a half mile and effect area to a quarter-mile burst)
Eclipse Burst (A7 Nec): (2) R500' 60' burst attempts to counteract magical light and inflicts 8d10 HP cold, plus 8d4 HP negative to living creatures (save Reflex; inflicts half HP; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double HP and permanent blindness) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d10 HP cold and +1d4 HP negative)
Electric Arc (AC1 Evo): (2) R30' Inflicts 1d4+3 electricity on 1 or 2 targets (save basic Reflex) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d4 HP)
Elemental Form (A5 Tra): (2) Self becomes a Medium elemental with 10 temporary HP, Armor Class 31, +18 attack, +9 damage, darkvision, +20 Acrobatics (air or fire) or Athletics (earth or water) modifier, and creature-specific features for 1 min (heightened 6th becomes a Large creature with 10' reach, 15 temporary HP, Armor Class 34, +23 attack, +13 damage, +23 Acrobatics or Athletics; 7th becomes a Huge creature with 15' reach, 20 temporary HP, Armor Class 34, +25 attack, +11 damage and double damage dice, and +25 Acrobatics or Athletics)
Elemental Tempest (A4 Foc Evo): (1) Subsequent casting of an acid, cold, electricity, or fire spell inflicts 1d6 HP per spell level of the same damage type on foes in a 10' emanation
Endure Elements (A2 Abj): (10 min) Protects touched from severe cold or heat until next daily prep (heightened 3rd protects from both cold and heat; 5th protects from extreme cold and heat)
Energy Absorption (A4 Foc Abj): (R) Gives self resistance 15 to damage from the triggering acid, cold, electricity, or fire effect (heightened +1 gives +5 resistance)
Energy Aegis (A7 Abj): (1 min) Touched gains resistance 5 to acid, cold, electricity, fire, force, negative, positive, and sonic damage for 1 day (heightened 9th gives resistance 10)
Enlarge (A2 Tra): (2) R30' Willing target becomes Large, gaining +5' reach, +2 melee damage, and clumsy 1 for 5 min (heightened 4th target becomes Huge, gaining +10' reach and +4 melee damage; 8th affects 10 creatures)
Enthrall (A3 Enc): (2) Fascinates creatures within 120' while sustained, with additional saves for disagreement (save Will negates; critical success allows the target to notice the attempt; critical failure allows no further saves)
False Life (A2 Nec): (2) Self gains 9 temporary HP for 8 hr (heightened +1 gives +3 HP)
False Vision (A5 Ill): (10 min) Controls the image shown by scrying within a 100' burst until next daily prep
Fear (A1 Enc): (2) R30' Inflicts frightened 2 (save Will inflicts frightened 1; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts frightened 3 and fleeing for 1 rd) (heightened 3rd affects 5 targets)
Feather Fall (A1 Abj): (R) R60' Falling target slows to 60' per rd and suffers no falling damage for 1 min or until landing
Feeblemind (A6 Enc): (2) R30' Inflicts stupefied 4 until the curse is removed (save Will inflicts stupefied 2 for 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts permanent animal intelligence and -5 Charisma, Intelligence, and Wisdom modifiers and changes a PC into an NPC)
Feet To Fins (A3 Tra): (2) Willing touched can swim at full Speed but slows to 5' on land for 10 min (heightened 6th effects last until next daily prep)
Fiery Body (A7 Tra): (2) Self gains fire immunity and resistance 10 to precision damage, suffers weakness 5 to cold and water, inflicts 3d6 HP fire on non-reach melee attackers, inflicts +1d4 HP fire on unarmed attacks and an additional die of damage on fire spells, can cast Produce Flame using 1 action as an innate spell, gains a 40' fly Speed, and does not need to breathe for 1 min (heightened 9th inflicts 4d6 HP fire on non-reach melee attackers, inflicts +2d4 HP fire on unarmed attacks, and increases fly Speed to 60')
Fire Shield (A4 Evo): (2) Self gains cold resistance 5, and melee attackers suffer 2d6 HP fire, for 1 min (heightened +2 gives cold resistance +5 and inflicts +1d6 HP)
Fireball (A3 Evo): (2) R500' 20' burst inflicts 6d6 HP fire (save basic Reflex) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP)
Flaming Sphere (A2 Evo): (2) R30' Movable flame inflicts 3d6 HP fire in a 15' sq while sustained for up to 1 min (save basic Reflex; success negates) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d6 HP)
Fleet Step (A1 Tra): (2) Self gains +30' Speed for 1 min
Flesh To Stone (A6 Tra): (2) R120' Inflicts initial slowed 1; subsequent failed or successful saves each rd increase or decrease the degree slowed until the target is no longer slowed or becomes immobile and permanently turned to stone (save Fortitude inflicts slowed 1 for 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts initial slowed 2)
Floating Disk (A1 Con): (2) Creates an invisible 2' radius disk that follows self and holds 5 Bulk for 8 hr
Fly (A4 Tra): (2) Touched gains a fly Speed of the greater of its Speed or 20' for 5 min (heightened 7th effects last for 1 hr)
Force Bolt (A1 Foc Evo): (1) R30' Inflicts 1d4+1 HP force (heightened +2 inflicts +1d4+1 HP)
Foresight (A9 Div): (2) Touched gains +2 initiative and does not suffer flat-footed vs. undetected and flanking creatures, and self may use a Reaction to give the target the better of two rolls or its foe the worse of two rolls, for 1 hr
Freedom Of Movement (A4 Abj): (2) Relieves touched of Speed penalty effects and gives automatic success on Escape attempts vs. non-magical effects and magical effects up to the spell level for 10 min
Gaseous Form (A4 Tra): (2) Touched becomes vapor with resistance 8 to physical damage, immunity to precision damage, proficiency modifier for unarmored defense, and 10' fly Speed for 5 min or until the target or self ends the spell
Gate (A10 Con): (2) R120' Opens a 40' radius gate to another plane while sustained for up to 1 min
Gentle Repose (A2 Nec): (2) Touched corpse does not decay and cannot be made undead until next daily prep (heightened 5th effects are permanent)
Ghost Sound (AC1 Ill): (2) R30' Creates sound equivalent to four humans shouting while sustained (heightened 3rd R60'; 5th R120')
Ghostly Weapon (A3 Tra): (2) Touched weapon becomes translucent and can affect incorporeal creatures for 5 min
Glitterdust (A2 Evo): (2) R120' 10' burst inflicts dazzled and negates invisibility for 1 min (save Reflex negates invisibility only for 2 rd; critical success negates; critical failure blinds for 1 rd and dazzles and negates invisibility for 10 min)
Globe Of Invulnerability (A4 Abj): (2) 10' burst attempts to counteract outside spells at the spell level - 1 for 10 min
Glyph Of Warding (A3 Abj): (10 min) Specified trigger on a target container or 10'x10' area triggers a chosen spell of lower level
Goblin Pox (A1 Nec): (2) Touched suffers stage 1 goblin pox, which inflicts sickened 1 for 1 rd; subsequent failures after 1 rd will inflict sickened 1 and slowed 1 for 1 rd at stage 2, and incurably sickened 1 for 1 dy at stage 3 (save Fortitude inflicts sickened 1 only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts stage 2; goblins and goblin dogs are immune)
Grease (A1 Con): (2) R30' 4 5' squares cause falls, or 1 target object inflicts a -2 penalty to checks, for 1 min (save Reflex or Acrobatics negates; critical failure causes the holder to drop the target object)
Grim Tendrils (A1 Nec): (2) 30' line inflicts 2d4 HP negative and 1 HP persistent bleed on living creatures (save Fortitude inflicts half HP negative only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double initial and persistent HP) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d4 HP initial and +1 HP persistent)
Gust Of Wind (A1 Evo): (2) 60' line extinguishes small, non-magical fires, disperses fog, moves light objects, and knocks prone creatures up to Large for 1 rd (save Fortitude prevents moving against the wind but does not knock prone; critical success negates; critical failure pushes 30', knocks prone, and inflicts 2d6 HP bludgeoning)
Hallucination (A5 Ill): (2) R30' Changes target's perception of an object or group for 1 hr (save Will target knows that it's hallucinating; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts -4 saves to disbelieve) (heightened 6th affects 10 targets or effects last until next daily prep; 8th affects any number of targets or effects are permanent)
Hallucinatory Terrain (A4 Ill): (10 min) R500' 50' burst illusion changes the look, sound, feel, and smell of the terrain until next daily prep (heightened 5th the illusion can mask or incorporate structures)
Hand Of The Apprentice (A1 Foc Evo): (1) R500' Makes a remote attack with a melee weapon; a critical hit inflicts the critical specialization effect
Haste (A3 Tra): (2) R30' Target gains an extra Strike or Stride action each rd for 1 min (heightened 7th affects 6 targets)
Hideous Laughter (A2 Enc): (2) R30' Inflicts slowed 1 and loss of Reactions while sustained (save Will inflicts loss of Reactions only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts prone for 1 rd, then slowed 1 and loss of Reactions)
Horrid Wilting (A8 Nec): (2) Targets in a 500' radius suffer 10d10 HP negative (save basic Fortitude; plant and water creatures worsen save by 1 degree) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d10 HP)
Humanoid Form (A2 Tra): (2) Self becomes a Small or Medium humanoid and gains +4 Deception to pass as the chosen ancestry for 10 min (heightened 3rd gives darkvision or low-light vision if appropriate to the ancestry; 5th becomes a Large humanoid)
Hydraulic Push (A1 Evo): (2) R60' Spell attack inflicts 3d6 HP bludgeoning and a 5' push (double HP and distance with a critical success) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP)
Hypnotic Pattern (A3 Ill): (2) R120' 10' burst inflicts dazzled and fascinated while sustained for up to 1 min (save Will inflicts dazzled only; critical failure inflicts loss of Reactions)
Illusory Creature (A2 Ill): (2) R500' Creates an image of a Large or smaller creature with Armor Class 29, +19 attack, 1d4+3 HP nonlethal mental damage, and +19 saves while sustained or until damaged; each Sustain allows directing two actions (heightened +1 creature inflicts +1d4 HP and can be one size larger)
Illusory Disguise (A1 Ill): (2) Makes self appear different and gives +16 Deception to avoid uncovering the disguise for 1 hr (heightened 2nd also disguises voice and scent; 3rd allows copying a specific individual)
Illusory Object (A1 Ill): (2) R500' Creates an image of a stationary object in a 20' burst for 10 min (heightened 2nd effects include sounds and smells and last for 1 hr; 5th effects are permanent)
Illusory Scene (A5 Ill): (10 min) R500' Creates in a 30' burst a moving illusion with up to 10 creatures or objects, sounds, and smells for 1 hr (heightened 6th creatures in the scene can speak; 8th effects are permanent)
Implosion (A9 Evo): (2) R30' Inflicts 75 HP on 1 target each rd while sustained for up to 1 min; a target cannot be affected twice by a single casting (save basic Fortitude) (heightened +1 inflicts +10 HP)
Invisibility (A2 Ill): (2) Touched becomes invisible for 10 min or until it uses a hostile action (heightened 4th effects last for 1 min, and a hostile action does not end the spell)
Invisibility Cloak (A4 Foc Ill): (2) Self becomes invisible for 1 min; using a hostile action ends the spell (heightened 6th effects last 10 min; 8th effects last 1 hr)
Invisibility Sphere (A3 Ill): (2) 10' emanation makes creatures within invisible for 10 min or until any affected performs a hostile act (heightened 5th effects last for 1 hr)
Item Facade (A1 Ill): (2) Makes the target object up to a 10' cube appear decrepit or perfect for 1 hr (heightened 2nd effects last for 24 hr; 3rd effects are permanent)
Jump (A1 Tra): (1) Allows self to jump 30' immediately (heightened 3rd affects touched, and effects last for 1 min)
Knock (A2 Tra): (2) R30' Gives +4 Athletics or Thievery on attempts to open the target object for 1 min; untrained attempts by self gain an additional +12
Levitate (A3 Evo): (2) Allows self to use concentrate actions to move the touched object or willing creature up or down 10' for 5 min
Life Siphon (A4 Foc Nec): (R) Casting a necromancy spell restores 1d8 HP per spell level to self
Light (AC1 Evo): (2) Touched object lights a 20' radius until next daily prep (heightened 4th lights a 60' radius)
Lightning Bolt (A3 Evo): (2) 120' line inflicts 4d12 HP electricity (save basic Reflex) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d12 HP)
Locate (A3 Div): (10 min) R500' Reveals the direction to a named object or the nearest object of a named type while sustained; effects are blocked by lead and running water (heightened 5th reveals the direction to a creature or ancestry)
Lock (A1 Abj): (2) Touched latch or lock opens only for self until next daily prep; a successful DC 29 Athletics or Thievery check (or lock DC + 4 if higher) ends the spell (heightened 2nd effects are permanent)
Longstrider (A1 Tra): (2) Self gains +10' Speed for 1 hr (heightened 2nd effects last for 8 hr)
Mage Armor (A1 Abj): (2) Self gains +1 Armor Class with a +5 maximum Dexterity modifier until next daily prep (heightened 4th also gives +1 saves; 6th gives +2 Armor Class; 8th gives +2 saves; 10th gives +3 Armor Class and saves)
Mage Hand (AC1 Evo): (2) R30' Moves a light object 20' per rd while sustained (heightened 3rd moves a Bulk 1 object; 5th R60'; 7th moves a Bulk 2 object)
Magic Aura (A1 Ill): (1 min) Alters the magical aura of the target object, making it appear as non-magical, as a common magical item of up to twice the spell level, or as under the effects of a spell of up to the spell level, until next daily prep (heightened 3rd can affect a creature or all of its possessions)
Magic Missile (A1 Evo): (1) R120' 1 missile (2 or 3 actions gives 2 or 3 missiles) inflicts 1d4+1 HP force (heightened +2 gives 1 additional missile per action)
Magic Mouth (A2 Ill): (2) The image of a mouth appears on the touched creature or object and speaks a specified message up to 25 words the next time a specified trigger occurs within 30'
Magic Weapon (A1 Tra): (2) Touched weapon gains +1 attack and 2 damage dice for 1 min
Magnificent Mansion (A7 Con): (1 min) R30' Creates an entrance to a 40'x40'x40' demiplane that can only be entered by those specified, is staffed by servants, and contains provisions for up to 150 people
Mariner's Curse (A5 Nec): (2) Touched suffers incurable sickened 1, plus slowed 1 on open water, until the curse is removed (save Will inflicts curable sickened 1; critical success negates; critical success inflicts incurable sickened 2)
Mask Of Terror (A7 Ill): (2) R30' Target inflicts frightened 2 for 1 rd on attackers for 1 min (save Will negates; critical failure prevents attack) (heightened 8th affects 5 targets)
Massacre (A9 Nec): (2) 60' line inflicts 100 HP negative on creatures up to level 17 and kills those reduced to 0 HP; if none die, it inflicts an additional 30 negative on all within the line, including self (save Fortitude inflicts 9d6 HP; critical success negates; critical failure kills) (heightened 10th inflicts 115 HP (save Fortitude 10d6 HP) on creatures up to level 19)
Maze (A8 Con): (2) R30' Transports the target to an extradimensional maze while sustained or until it has a critical success or 2 successive normal successes on DC 29 Survival or Perception checks
Meld Into Stone (A3 Tra): (2) Allows self to enter a touched stone, retaining the ability to hear outside sounds, for 10 min
Mending (A1 Tra): (10 min) Restores 5 HP per spell level to a light, non-magical object (heightened 2nd can affect a 1 Bulk object; 3rd can affect a 2 Bulk or magical 1 Bulk object)
Message (AC1 Ill): (1) R120' Allows self to hold a private conversation with a visible target for 1 turn (heightened 3rd R500')
Meteor Swarm (A9 Evo): (2) R500' 4 meteors each inflict 6d10 HP bludgeoning in a 10' burst and 14d6 HP fire in a 40' burst (save basic Reflex) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d10 HP bludgeoning and +2d6 HP fire)
Mind Blank (A8 Abj): (2) R30' Target gains +4 saves vs. mental effects and automatic counteract attempts at the spell level + 1 vs. detection, revelation, and scrying until next daily prep
Mind Probe (A5 Div): (1 min) R30' Self gains answers from the target, requiring a DC 29 Deception check to refuse to answer each, with critical success giving a believable false answer (save Will negates; critical failure inflicts -4 Deception)
Mind Reading (A3 Div): (2) R30' Reveals the surface thoughts of the target and whether its intelligence is higher, lower, or equal (save Will reveals relative intelligence only; critical success allows the target to read self's surface thoughts instead; critical failure allows sustaining for up to 1 min with no further save attempts)
Mirror Image (A2 Ill): (2) Creates three duplicates that have an equal chance of misdirecting attacks on self for 1 min; any hit on a duplicate destroys it, and a critical success also hits self with a normal success
Misdirection (A2 Ill): (1 min) R30' Changes the magical aura of one target to mimic a second target until next daily prep
Mislead (A6 Ill): (2) Turns self invisible and creates an illusory duplicate while sustained for up to 1 min; a successful Deception vs. Perception can make it appear that a self action originated with the duplicate
Monstrosity Form (A8 Tra): (2) Self becomes a Huge phoenix, purple worm, or sea serpent with 20 temporary HP, Armor Class 32, +28 attack, darkvision, +30 Athletics modifier, and creature-specific attacks for 1 min (heightened 9th gives 25 temporary HP, Armor Class 34, +31 attack, an additional damage die, +33 Athletics)

Obscuring Mist (A2 Con): (3) R120' 20' burst conceals creatures for 1 min

Paralyze (A3 Enc): (2) R30' Inflicts paralyzed for 1 rd (save Will inflicts stunned 1; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts paralyzed for 4 rd; subsequent successful saves shorten the effects by 1 rd, and a critical success ends them) (heightened 7th affects 10 targets)
Passwall (A5 Con): (2) Creates a 5'x10'x10' tunnel in wood, plaster, or stone for 1 hr (heightened 7th the tunnel extends 20', appears as normal wall, and can be entered only using a password or trigger)

Phantasmal Calamity (A6 Ill): (2) R500' 30' burst inflicts 11d6 HP mental (save basic Will; critical failure also inflicts stunned 1 and trapped until a subsequent Will save each rd succeeds) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP)
Phantasmal Killer (A4 Ill): (2) R120' Inflicts 8d6 HP mental and frightened 2 (save Will inflicts 4d6 HP mental and frightened 1; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts death on a failed Fortitude save or 12d6 HP mental, fleeing for 1 rd, and frightened 1 on success) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP, or +3d6 HP on a critical failure)
Phantom Steed (A2 Con): (10 min) R30' Conjures a magical mount (Armor Class 20, HP 10, 40' Speed) that can be ridden only by a designated creature for 8 hr (heightened 4th mount has 60' Speed and can move normally over water and natural difficult terrain; 5th mount can also Air Walk for 1 rd; 6th mount has 80' Speed and can fly)
Physical Boost (A1 Foc Tra): (1) Touched gains +2 on the next Acrobatics check, Athletics check, Fortitude save, or Reflex save within the next rd
Plane Shift (A7 Con): (10 min) Transports self and 8 willing targets to an imprecise location on a different plane

Prestidigitation (AC1 Evo): (2) R10' Performs cooking, lifting, making a minor object, or tidying while sustained
Prismatic Sphere (A9 Abj): (2) R10' 20' bright light in a 10' burst inflicts blindness for 1 rd (save Will inflicts dazzled for 1 rd; critical failure inflicts blindness for 1 min) and these effects on creatures passing through for 1 hr: 20 HP fire (save basic Reflex); 25 HP acid (save basic Reflex); 30 HP electricity (save basic Reflex); 10 HP poison and enfeebled 1 for 1 min (save basic Fortitude also negates enfeebled); Flesh To Stone effects (save Fortitude inflicts slowed 1 for 1 rd; critical success negates); Warp Mind effects (save Will inflicts confused for 1 action; critical success negates); slowed 1 for 1 min (save Will negates; critical failure inflicts Plane Shift effects)
Prismatic Spray (A7 Evo): (2) 30' cone randomly inflicts one of these effects on each creature affected: (1) 50 HP fire (save Reflex negates); (2) 60 HP acid (save Reflex negates); (3) 70 HP electricity (save Reflex negates); (4) 30 HP poison and enfeebled 1 for 1 min (save Fortitude negates); (5) Flesh To Stone effects (save Fortitude negates); (6) Warp Mind effects (save Will negates); (7) slowed 1 for 1 min (save Will negates; critical failure inflicts Plane Shift effects); (8) two of the preceding effects

Scrying (A6 Div): (10 min) Creates an invisible sensor that allows self to see the target creature while sustained for up to 10 min (save Will negates; critical success allows the target to glimpse self; critical failure allows the sensor to follow the target; scrying an unfamiliar target lowers the save DC by 2, and scrying an unknown target lowers it by 10)

Sending (A5 Div): (3) Self exchanges a pair of 25-word messages with a known creature

Sleep (A1 Enc): (2) R30' 5' burst inflicts unconsciousness for 1 min or until a successful Perception check (save Will inflicts -1 Perception for 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts unconsciousness for 1 hr or until a successful Perception check) (heightened 4th inflicts unconsciousness for 1 rd, or 1 min on a critical failure; targets release held objects and do not wake from a successful Perception check)

Unrelenting Observation (A8 Div): (2) R100' 5 targets in a 20' burst can see a 6th target for 1 hr; lead and running water block the vision (save Will effects last for 1 min; critical success negates)

Vibrant Pattern (A6 Ill): (2) R120' 10' burst dazzles and blinds creatures while sustained for up to 1 min; a successful save each rd after leaving the area removes the blindness (save Will inflicts dazzled only; critical failure blinds for 1 min with no further saves)
Vigilant Eye (A4 Foc Div): (1) R500' Creates an invisible sensor that allows self to see from the target location for 1 hr; spending a Focus Point extends the duration to 2 hr

Wall Of Ice (A5 Evo): (3) R120' Creates a 60'x10'x1' wall or a 10' radius hemisphere of opaque ice with Armor Class 10, Hardness 10, weakness to fire 15, and 40 HP per 10' section for 1 min; rubble from destruction inflicts 2d6 HP cold and difficult terrain (heightened +2 each section gains +10 HP, and rubble inflicts +1d6 HP)
Wall Of Stone (A5 Con): (3) R120' Creates a permanent 120'x20'x1" stone wall with Armor Class 10, Hardness 14, and 50 HP per 10' section; rubble from destruction inflicts difficult terrain (heightened +2 each section gains +15 HP)
Wall Of Wind (A3 Evo): (3) R120' Creates a 60'x30'x5' wind wall that blocks small ammunition, inflicts -2 attack on larger ammunition, inflicts difficult terrain, and blocks flying creatures for 1 min (save Fortitude (flying creature) allows passage as difficult terrain; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts a 10' push)
Warp Mind (A7 Enc): (2) R120' Inflicts confused for 1 min (save Will inflicts confused for 1 action; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts permanent confusion)
Warped Terrain (A1 Foc Ill): (1) R60' 5' burst (2 or 3 actions give a 10' or 15' burst) illusion inflicts difficult terrain for 1 min (heightened 4th affects air instead of surface)
Water Breathing (A2 Tra): (1 min) R30' 5 targets can breathe water for 1 hr (heightened 3rd effects last for 8 hr; 4th effects last until next daily prep)
Water Walk (A2 Tra): (2) Touched can walk on liquids for 10 min (heightened 4th R30' affects 10 creatures, and effects last for 1 hr)
Weapon Storm (A4 Evo): (2) Weapon swing inflicts 4 dice of damage to every creature in a 30' cone or 10' emanation (save Reflex inflicts half HP; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double HP and critical specialization effect) (heightened +1 inflicts +1 damage die)
Web (A2 Con): (3) R30' 10' burst inflicts difficult terrain and -10' Speed for 1 rd (save Reflex or Athletics negates for 1 action; critical success negates for 1 rd; critical failure inflicts immobilized for 1 rd or until a successful Escape; successful Athletics also clears squares upon leaving)
Weird (A9 Ill): (2) R120' Inflicts 16d6 HP mental and frightened 2 on all targets within range (save Will inflicts half HP and frightened 1; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts death on a failed subsequent Fortitude save or double HP, frightened 2 and fleeing on success; critical success negates fleeing)
Wish (A10 Div): (3) Reverses effects that require Wish or produces effects similar to a known arcane spell of up to 9th level or a common spell of up to 7th level
Magic Notes:
Abjuration: +1 spell slot each level/Has a focus pool and 1 Focus Point/Knows the Protective Ward arcane spell
Advanced School Spell (Abjuration): Knows the Energy Absorption arcane spell/+1 Focus Points
Arcane Sense: Knows the Detect Magic arcane innate spell; can cast it at 1st level at will
Expert Spellcaster: Spell Expert (Arcane)
Abjuration: Knows 1 additional 1st-level abjuration spell
Arcane Spellcasting: Can learn spells from the arcane tradition
Cantrip Expansion: Can prepare two additional cantrips each day or add two additional cantrips to repertoire
Conceal Spell: (1) Hides spellcasting from observers with a successful Stealth vs. Perception, plus a successful Deception vs. Perception for verbal spells
Drain Bonded Item: (F) Can cast an expended spell using power stored in a possession once per day
Magic Sense: Has continuous 1st-level Detect Magic effects that increase to 3rd-level during Seek
Spell Substitution: Can use a 10-min process to replace 1 prepared spell with a different spell
Steady Spellcasting: Successful DC 15 flat check negates spellcasting disruption
Widen Spell: (1) Increases the effect of a subsequent 10' or greater radius area spell by 5', the effect of a 15' or shorter line or cone spell by 5', or the effect of a longer line or cone spell by 10'
